A Blood bank is a center where blood gathered as result of blood donation is stored as preserved for later use in blood transfusion. The term “Blood Bank” typically refers to divisionof a hospital where the storage of blood product occurs and where proper testing is performed

Please let us know if you need the blood for yourself or for any relatives.
Connect with generous donors who are ready to support \n your cause and make a positivev impact!

A blood bank is a facility that collects, stores, processes, and distributes blood and its components to hospitals and medical centers. It ensures a safe and adequate supply of blood for patients in need of transfusions.

string.name: life_saving_resource_provides_essential_blood_for_surgeries_emergencies_and_chronic_illnesses
string.font: Provides essential blood for surgeries, emergencies, and chronic illnesses

string.name: improved_health_outcomes_enhances_patient_recovery_and_survival_rates_through_timely_blood_transfusions
string.font: Enhances patient recovery and survival rates through timely blood transfusions.

string.name: community_support_encourages_community_participation_and_volunteerism_fostering_a_sense_of_solidarity
string.font: Encourages community participation and volunteerism, fostering a sense of solidarity.

string.name: quality_assurance_ensures_the_safety_and_quality_of_blood_through_rigorous_testing_and_processing
string.font: Ensures the safety and quality of blood through rigorous testing and processing.

string.name: readiness_for_emergencies_maintains_a_ready_supply_of_blood_for_disaster_response_and_critical_situations
string.font: Maintains a ready supply of blood for disaster response and critical situations

resources.string: - Personal Information: Name, Email, Contact Number, Blood Group, City.\n- Usage Data: Information on how you use the app, such as interaction with features.
- To connect blood donors with those in need.\n- To notify users of blood donation requests that match their blood group and location.
- We share your information with authorized personnel and other users as necessary to fulfill blood donation requests.\n- We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.
- You must provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration.\n- You agree not to misuse the app, including but not limited to using it for unauthorized or unlawful purposes.

- We collect personal information (Name, Email, Contact Number, Blood Group, City) to provide our blood donation services.\n- This data is used to connect users with blood donation requests and to notify them of relevant opportunities.
- We implement security measures such as encryption to protect your data.\n- Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only.
Agree For Term & Condition?I confirm I am of legal age and agree to the Terms and Data Privacy.

resources.string: For any questions or concerns regarding data safety, please contact us at +923451927809.
- We ensure that our data practices comply with relevant laws, including GDPR.
- You can request the deletion or correction of your personal data by contacting us at +923451927809.
- Your data is shared only with authorized personnel and other users for the purpose of blood donation.
Katlang Blood Donation & Thalassemia Center Application
For any questions or concerns, please contact us at +923451927809.
We may update this policy from time to time. You will be notified of any significant changes.
We comply with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR and any other relevant regulations.
You have the right to request the deletion of your account and personal data at any time by contacting us at +92345192780
We use industry-standard measures to protect your data, including encryption and secure servers. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information:
You can access or update your personal information through your profile settings. You can also request deletion of your account.
